name: Salomon S/Force 7 + Z10 GW Skis + Bindings - Unisex
description: A great choice for resort skiers looking to move up from renting, this ski will grow with you and won't hold you back as you build confidence on groomed and mixed terrain. Included bindings have a 3-size adjustment range, so you can match them up with your boots and hit the slopes right away.Glossy TPU coated topsheet resists damage.Lightweight poplar core for a nimble ride.Semi-sidewall construction is durable, with excellent edge hold in firm snow.Rocker tip improves soft snow performance.Included binding has a release value range of DIN 3-10, and is ideal for beginner to intermediate skiers.
